use_cases_desc: Evaluate cross-device interaction techniques with domain experts for the specific use case in a hospital
evaluation: User study (qualitative); User study (quantitative, controlled lab experiment); Deployment with users
contribution_desc: Study that compares interaction techniques for using handheld devices together with stationary displays in a hospital setting.
interaction_techniques: Remote control; UI distribution; Visualisation; Data exploration
crossdevice_def: multi-device user interfaces; multi-device interaction; multi-display interaction
